author: HERO
description: Kyoko Hori is your average teenage girl ... who has a side she wants no one else to ever find about. Then there's her classmate Izumi Miyamura, your average glasses-wearing boy in school and a totally different person outside. When the two meet unexpectedly, they discover each others' secrets and develop an unexpected friendship.
